title: Emergency 'Break Glass' Access
description: A critical system is down, and the normal administrator is unavailable. A different administrator needs emergency 'break glass' access to fix it.

tasks.description: Receive the emergency break-glass access request, including justification for the emergency.
Manually verify the request with a second manager to confirm the emergency.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst follows the two-person approval process for emergency access.

tasks.description: Manually grant the administrator temporary access to the system and ensure their session is being recorded.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully grants the temporary, monitored access needed to resolve the emergency.
